titles.title: Unrecognized Southeast Alaska Native Communities Recognition and Compensation Act
Unrecognized Southeast Alaska Native Communities Recognition and Compensation Act
To provide for the recognition of certain Alaska Native communities and the settlement of certain claims under the Alaska Native Claims Settlement Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
Unrecognized Southeast Alaska Native Communities Recognition and Compensation Act
This bill permits the Alaska Native residents of certain Alaska Native villages to organize as Alaska Native urban corporations and to receive certain settlement land.
